column2: ADs shall require prior permission of the D/DFE, for any transaction or transfer to/from SFCA – Short Term Loans for any
purpose which falls outside the purview of these Directions.

column1: 10. For the purpose of these Directions;

column2:
a. 
“Designated  Foreign  Currency”  shall  include  United  States  Dollar  (USD),  Euro,  Sterling  Pound,  Australian  Dollar,
Singapore  Dollars,  Swedish  Kroner,  Swiss  Franc,  Canadian  Dollar,  Hong  Kong  Dollar,  Japanese  Yen,  Danish  Kroner,
Norwegian Kroner, Chinese Renminbi, New Zealand Dollars Thai Baht and Indian Rupees;

b. 
“Remittances”  shall  include  telegraphic  transfers,  other  interbank  transfers,  bank  drafts,  other  payment  instruments,
payments  received  via  other  internationally  accepted  payment  mechanisms  or  platforms  and  funds  received  from
exchange companies/houses in foreign currency from abroad, other than currency notes.
